# DateTimeExtensions.ToShortUiFormatAsString method

Converts a DateTime object into dd/MM/yyyy string.

```csharp
public static string ToShortUiFormatAsString(this DateTime target)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | Target datetime. |

## Return Value

A String that contains the expected format.
